title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Whisk the eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Toss the cooked spaghetti with the pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Fry onions and add tomatoes to make the gravy.
Add the grilled chicken to the gravy and cook.
Stir in cream and simmer until thickened.
